title: Bloomberg's Rie on US Antitrust Suits Against ANTM, AET (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Rie on US Antitrust Suits Against ANTM, AET (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Jennifer Rie, Litigation Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, on US antitrust officials said to be readying suits against the Anthem and Aetna deals.
